attributes.action: make Boris Johnson the leader of the Conservative party and run in the General Election for PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to make Boris Johnson the leader of the Conservative party and run for PM.

This will not only generate more interest for young people in politics but also ensure that more decisions are made in favour of the majority of the people of England.

This will of course also inject a bit of Boris's Humour into the House of Commons.

I am in no doubt that the powers that be will look at this and laugh, however I urge them to think carefully about this, as it not a joke, it is a serious petition that politics and the house should look at and will help all their causes a great deal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
